document_data.name: Cressaro
document_data.mainbody: '''Cressaro''' was the [[cloud giant]] castellan of [[Lyn Armaal]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.History:
Cressaro was a young giant in the late 1480s or early 1490s DR. He was the castellan, consort and personal bodyguard of Countess [[Sansuri]].

His normal duty was overseeing the correct flying of Lyn Armaal.
document_data.Personality: Cressaro followed the orders of Sansuri without doubts, deeply loyal to her.
